confidence_levels.HIGH: Verified through countable elements, standard dimensions, or multiple photo confirmation
confidence_levels.MEDIUM: Single photo measurement with perspective correction or reasonable architectural assumptions
confidence_levels.LOW: Visual estimates without scale reference or inferred from typical construction practice

medium_confidence_measurements.evidence: Space station scale, cathedral volumes, 1M+ sq ft footprint
medium_confidence_measurements.requires_verification: Site plan, aerial photography, or construction documents

medium_confidence_measurements.evidence: Pioneering tensile sail technology, experimental engineering, cathedral ceiling heights

low_confidence_measurements.method: Standard mall range with scale correction
low_confidence_measurements.note: Train station/airport scale, NOT typical 12-15 foot mall corridors
low_confidence_measurements.requires_verification: Photogrammetry using door frames (80") as scale reference
Photos showing multiple columns with scale reference

unverified_zones.note: Interior off-limits forever. Can document exterior access points (ramps, vents) only.
unverified_zones.decision: Include as placeholder per user answer 7-A

unverified_zones.note: Theater entrance position is HIGH confidence - it IS the focal void at food court center

timeline_contradictions.note: Contradictions are NOT errors - they are timeline variance across 1981-2010 photo span
timeline_contradictions.philosophy: All eras are canon. Contradictions reveal layers.

examples.resolution: Document multiple configurations, do not force consistency

examples.evidence: White vs beige fabric in different photos
examples.resolution: Document as 'white tensile fabric' with note on variance

examples.evidence: Some photos show dark entrance, others show activity
examples.interpretation: Business hours, closure periods, or permanent closure
examples.resolution: Map theater location but note variable operational status

primary_global_anchor.use_case: Global scale calibration for corridor measurements

z_level_calibration.use_case: Vertical height differential between Z=0 and Z=-1

vertical_scale.use_case: Atrium ceiling height and overall vertical scale
vertical_scale.requires: Ground reference photos for precise measurement

priority_targets_for_v2: Z7 exterior access points (ramps, vents, service doors)
Z2 upper ring corridors (more coverage needed)
Z6 theater entrance and Mickey's wing
Mast height with ground reference visible

architectural_significance.technology: Pioneering tensile sail architecture - early 1980s experimental
architectural_significance.design_intent: Civic monument architecture for proto-Silicon Valley tech culture
architectural_significance.scale: Space station with a parking lot - cathedral volumes, train station circulation
architectural_significance.cultural_context: Built for workers whose minds operated in systems, engineering, and futures
architectural_significance.what_died: Not just a mall - the death of architectural futurism and 1980s tech optimism
architectural_significance.documentation_purpose: Historical preservation of experimental architecture that may no longer exist in original form

v2_batch_goals: Raise atrium diameter from MEDIUM to HIGH confidence
Raise mast height from MEDIUM to HIGH confidence
Confirm food court pit depth (8' vs deeper 15-20')
